description: You can choose whom to affect when you channel energy.

sections.text: When you channel energy, you can choose a number of targets in the area up to your Charisma modifier. These targets are not affected by your channeled energy.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: All targets in a 30-foot burst are affected when you channel energy. You can only choose whether or not you are affected.
sections.name: Normal

name: Selective Channeling
